author: rmannibucau
msg: resetting the current classloader to the openejb-client one only if needed classes can't be already found, this way we should be able to deploy a jar which is not in AppClassLoader

author: jleroux
msg: Improves the LookupBulkAddProducts form by disabling the amount field when Product.requireAmount field is not "Y"
No needs to use return there. I also tried a simple UEL expression (ie removing groovy interpretation by removing "groovy:"), it did not work
This really shows that, at least OOTB, only one possible syntax should be used, else it's only confusing more!
